titleStmt.title: The first anniversary of the government under His Highness the Lord Protector.
titleStmt.author: Marvell, Andrew, 1621-1678.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Newcomb, and are to be sold by Samuel Gellibrand at the golden Ball in Pauls Church-yard, near the west-end,

notesStmt.note: Annotations on Thomason copy: "1654. Jan: 17"; the second 5 in 1655 has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the golden Ball in Pauls Church-yard, near the west-end
